Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ أَنْ تُخْدَعَ عَنْ صَدِيقِكَ أَوْ تُغْلَبَ عَنْ عَدُوِّكَ
enWisdom: Be careful not to remain in the company of the immoral, for surely evil clings to evil

Wisdom: أَطِعْ أَخَاكَ وَإِنْ عَصَاكَ وَصِلْهُ وَإِنْ جَفَاكَ
enWisdom: Brothers are eliminators of grief and sorrow

Wisdom: أَكْرِمْ وُدَّكَ وَاحْفَظْ عَهْدَكَ
enWisdom: Honour your friendship and keep your promise

Wisdom: أَعِنْ أَخَاكَ عَلَى هِدَايَتِهِ
enWisdom: Assist your bother in gaining his guidance

Wisdom: ارْفُقْ بِإِخْوَانِكَ وَاكْفِهِمْ غَرْبَ لِسَانِكَ وَأَجْرِ عَلَيْهِمْ سَيْبَ [سَبَبَ‏] إِحْسَانِكَ
enWisdom: Be courteous to your brothers and don’t expose them to the harshness of your tongue; and let your goodness flow forth for them

Wisdom: اذْكُرْ أَخَاكَ إِذَا غَابَ بِالَّذِي تُحِبُّ أَنْ يَذْكُرَكَ بِهِ وَإِيَّاكَ وَمَا يَكْرَهُ وَدَعْهُ مِمَّا تُحِبُّ أَنْ يَدَعَكَ مِنْهُ
enWisdom: Remember you brother who is absent in the same way that which you would like him to remember you [in your absence] and keep away from what he dislikes; and disregard from him that which you would like him to disregard from you

Wisdom: امْحَضْ أَخَاكَ النَّصِيحَةَ حَسَنَةً كَانَتْ أَوْ قَبِيحَةً
enWisdom: Be sincere in giving your brother advice whether [he finds it] courteous or offensive

Wisdom: ابْذُلْ لِصَدِيقِكَ كُلَّ الْمَوَدَّةِ وَلَا تَبْذُلْ لَهُ كُلَّ الطُّمَأْنِينَةِ وَأَعْطِهِ مِنْ نَفْسِكَ كُلَّ الْمُوَاسَاةِ وَلَا تَقُصَّ [لا تفضي‏] إِلَيْهِ بِكُلِّ أَسْرَارِكَ
enWisdom: Spare no effort in showing affection to your friend, but do not put your entire trust in him; give him all your support, but do not disclose all your secrets to him

Wisdom: ابْذُلْ لِصَدِيقِكَ نُصْحَكَ وَلِمَعَارِفِكَ مَعُونَتَكَ وَلكانة [لِكَافَّةِ] النَّاسِ بِشْرَكَ
enWisdom: Offer your advice to your friend, your assistance to your acquaintance, and to all the people, your cheerfulness

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ أَنْ تَغْفَلَ عَنْ حَقِّ أَخِيكَ اتِّكَالًا عَلَى وَاجِبِ حَقِّكَ عَلَيْهِ فَإِنَّ لِأَخِيكَ عَلَيْكَ مِنَ الْحَقِّ مِثْلَ الَّذِي لَكَ عَلَيْهِ
enWisdom: Good companionship is something friends wish for

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ أَنْ تُوحِشَ مُوَادَّكَ وَحْشَةً تُفْضِي بِهِ إِلَى اخْتِيَارِهِ الْبُعْدَ عَنْكَ وَإِيثَارِ الْفُرْقَةِ
enWisdom: Be careful not to drive away your friend in a way that removes all the affection he has for you, and leave some room from your friendship for him so that he may rely on returning back to it

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ أَنْ تُهْمِلَ حَقَّ أَخِيكَ اتِّكَالًا عَلَى مَا بَيْنَكَ وَبَيْنَهُ فَلَيْسَ لَكَ بِأَخٍ مَنْ أَضَعْتَ حَقَّهُ
enWisdom: Be careful not to become negligent of your brother’s right [over you] while counting on your right over him, for indeed your brother has the same right over you that you have over him

Wisdom: إِذَا أَخَيْتَ فَأَكْرِمْ حَقَّ الْإِخَاءِ
enWisdom: When you [decide to] establish the bond of brotherhood, then honour the right of brotherhood

Wisdom: إِذَا وَثِقْتَ بِمَوَدَّةِ أَخِيكَ فَلَا تُبَالِ مَتَى لَقِيتَهُ وَلَقِيَكَ
enWisdom: When you [decide to] establish the bond of brotherhood, then honour the right of brotherhood

Wisdom: إِذَا اتَّخَذَكَ وَلِيُّكَ أَخاً فَكُنْ لَهُ عَبْداً وَامْنَحْهُ صِدْقَ الْوَفَاءِ وَحُسْنَ الصَّفَاءِ
enWisdom: When your friend takes you as a brother, then be like a servant to him and accord him with true loyalty and perfect sincerity

Wisdom: بِحُسْنِ الْمُوَافَقَةِ تَدُومُ الصُّحْبَةُ
enWisdom: Through mutual understanding, companionship lasts

Wisdom: تَحَبَّبْ إِلَى خَلِيلِكَ يُحْبِبْكَ وَأَكْرِمْهُ يُكْرِمْكَ وَآثِرْهُ عَلَى نَفْسِكَ يُؤْثِرْكَ عَلَى نَفْسِهِ وَأَهْلِهِ
enWisdom: Be warm-hearted to your friend and he will be warm-hearted towards you, honour him and he will honour you, give him preference over yourself and he will give you preference over himself and his family

Wisdom: سَاعِدْ أَخَاكَ عَلَى كُلِّ حَالٍ وَزُلْ مَعَهُ حَيْثُمَا زَالَ
enWisdom: Aid your brother in every situation, and go with him wherever he goes

Wisdom: قَلَّمَا تَدُومَ خُلَّةُ الْمَلُولِ
enWisdom: The friendship of kings seldom lasts

Wisdom: لِلشَّدَائِدِ تُدَّخَرُ الرِّجَالُ
enWisdom: It is for difficult times that [the friendships of important] men are preserved

Wisdom: مَنْ جَانَبَ [حَاسَبَ‏] الْإِخْوَانَ عَلَى كُلِّ ذَنْبٍ قَلَّ أَصْدِقَاؤُهُ
enWisdom: One who turns away from his brothers because of every [small] misdeed will have few friends

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَتَعَاهَدْ مُوَادِدَهُ فَقَدْ ضَيَّعَ الصَّدِيقَ
enWisdom: One who does not attend to the needs of the one who shows friendship towards him has lost a friend

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَقْصَى عَلَى صَدِيقِهِ انْقَطَعَتْ مَوَدَّتُهُ
enWisdom: One who demands too much from his friend will sever his friendship

Wisdom: مَنْ نَامَ عَنْ نُصْرَةِ وَلِيِّهِ انْتَبَهَ بِوَطْأَةِ عَدُوِّهِ
enWisdom: One who neglects to assist his friend is awoken by the footsteps of his [advancing] enemy

Wisdom: مِنْ شَرَائِطِ الْإِيمَانِ حُسْنُ مُصَاحَبَةِ الْإِخْوَانِ
enWisdom: Do not excuse one who is insincere in his friendship with you

Wisdom: مِنْ دَلَائِلِ الْخِذْلَانِ الِاسْتِهَانَةُ بِحُقُوقِ الْإِخْوَانِ
enWisdom: One of the indications of being forsaken by Allah is taking the rights of [one’s] brothers lightly

Wisdom: مَا سَادَ مَنِ احْتَاجَ إِخْوَانُهُ إِلَى غَيْرِهِ
enWisdom: He whose brothers need to turn to other than him [for help] has not achieved eminence

Wisdom: مَا يَمْنَعُ أَحَدَكُمْ أَنْ يَلْقَى أَخَاهُ بِمَا يَكْرَهُ مِنْ عَيْبِهِ إِلَّا مَخَافَةَ أَنْ يَلْقَاهُ بِمِثْلِهِ قَدْ تَصَافَيْتُمْ عَلَى حُبِّ الْعَاجِلِ وَرَفْضِ الْآجِلِ
enWisdom: Nothing prevents any of you from meeting his brother who has a fault which he hates [and advising him to reform] except the fear that he too may meet you with a similar fault; indeed you have joined together in the love of this transitory [life] and have rejected the Hereafter

Wisdom: نِظَامُ الْمُرُوَّةِ فِي مُجَاهَدَةِ أَخِيكَ عَلَى طَاعَةِ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ وَصَدِّهِ عَنْ مَعَاصِيهِ وَأَنْ يُكْثِرَ عَلَى ذَلِكَ مَلَامَهُ
enWisdom: The establishment of magnanimity is in struggling with your brother to make him obey Allah, the Glorified, and restraining him from disobeying Him, and increasing your censure [of him] for it

Wisdom: لَا تُضَيِّعَنَّ حَقَّ أَخِيكَ اتِّكَالًا عَلَى مَا بَيْنَكَ وَبَيْنَهُ فَلَيْسَ لَكَ بِأَخٍ مَنْ أَضَعْتَ حَقَّهُ
enWisdom: Do not neglect the rights of your brother out of confidence in your close relationship with him, for he whose rights you neglect is not your brother

Wisdom: لَا خَيْرَ فِيمَنْ يَهْجُرُ أَخَاهُ مِنْ غَيْرِ جُرْمٍ
enWisdom: Do not seek brotherhood [and friendship] among the uncouth people, rather seek it among the trustworthy and loyal people

Wisdom: أَخُوكَ مُوَاسِيكَ فِي الشِّدَّةِ
enWisdom: Be careful not to accompany the wicked, for they consider it a favour upon you to keep you safe from themselves

Wisdom: الْكَرَمُ تَحَمُّلُ أَعْبَاءِ الْمَغَارِمِ
enWisdom: Munificence is bearing the [heavy] burdens of [other people’s] liabilities
